response.name: HTML
response.desc: HTML holds the web together! Knowing basic HTML5 will get you up and running.

response.name: CSS
response.desc: CSS makes the web look good! We're using the Bootstrap library here and we suggest doing that unless you are awesome at CSS.

response.name: JavaScript
response.detail: a powerful language to make it all work
response.desc: JavaScript gives life to your HTML! If you know JavaScript, that's great! But you don't need to know it at all to use HTMW, we're using jQuery for fun.

response.name: JSON
response.desc: JSON provides data to your HTML! If you are comfortable with JSON you can write and consume your own data. If you aren't you can use no-code endpoints like zzzap.io for your data.
